Biography

SENIOR (2021-22): American Southwest Conference Sportsmanship Athlete of the Year ... Appeared in 13 contests ... Had 10 points in win at Austin College ... Tallied seven points and three rebounds at UTD.

SENIOR (2020-21): Season cut short due to injury.

JUNIOR (2019-20): Second Team All-American Southwest Conference East Division ... ASC Championship All-Tournament Team ... Named ASC East Player of the Week (Feb. 17) ... Averaged 13.5 points and 5.8 rebounds ... Scored career-high 32 points on 12 of 19 shooting in win over Mary Hardin-Baylor (Feb. 15) ... Scored in double figures in 22 games ... Scored 20 or more points in five games ... Had 27 points, nine rebounds and four assists vs. Whitman ... Had 22 points and seven rebounds vs. Benedictine ... Had 21 points, nine rebounds and season-high six assists vs. Concordia Texas ... Had career-high five steals at Millsaps (Nov. 24) ... Had 10 points and 10 rebounds at Belhaven ... Had 11 points and 11 rebounds vs. Whitworth in NCAA Tournament ... Team captain ... Dean's List in fall and spring semesters ... ASC Academic All-Conference ... National Association of Basketball Coaches Honor Court.

SOPHOMORE (2018-19): Second Team All-ASC East selection ... Appeared in 26 games, making 25 starts ... Averaged 13.2 points and 5.2 rebounds per game ... Had single-game highs of 25 points vs. Millsaps and career-high 13 rebounds vs. Schreiner ... Team captain.

FRESHMAN (2017-18): ASC East Division Freshman of the Year ... ASC East All-Freshman Team ... Named ASC East Division Player of the Week (Jan. 8) ... Appeared in all 29 games, starting 26 ... Averaged 15.1 points and 5.9 rebounds per game ... Had single-game highs of 27 points vs. East Texas-Baptist and 11 rebounds at Emory University ... Had career-high seven assists at Belhaven.

Prior to LeTourneau: Named District Offensive Player of the Year as a senior at Stratford High School ... First Team All-District selection as a junior and senior ... Second Team All-District as a sophomore ... Averaged 22.8 points, 6.3 rebounds, 4.2 assists and 2.0 steals per game as senior.

Personal: Son of Janet Wright and Jarred Moore ... Kinesiology major.
